name: fis-architecture
description: Federal Intelligence System (FIS) 3.2 - File-based multi-agent workflow framework. FIS manages workflow (JSON tickets), QMD manages content. Optional Python helpers for badge generation.
author: CyberMao

forAgents.whenToUse: Complex multi-role tasks requiring workflow tracking
forAgents.whenNotToUse: Simple queries or tasks completable in < 10 minutes
forAgents.keyDecision: Use decision tree to determine SubAgent delegation
forAgents.securityNote: Review SECURITY.md before granting code_execute permissions

postInstall.message: Core FIS requires no initialization. Optional: pip install Pillow qrcode for badge generation.
